input: Subject: A serene lotus pond; Characteristics: blooming lotus flowers and lily pads; Timing and lighting: early morning with misty atmosphere; Background: traditional Asian architecture; Feeling: peaceful and harmonious.
coverage: A serene lotus pond adorned with blooming pink lotus flowers and vibrant green lily pads, captured in the early morning enveloped by a misty atmosphere. Soft, diffused sunlight gently illuminates the scene, creating subtle shadows and a tranquil glow. In the background, traditional Asian architecture with elegant pagoda rooftops and graceful wooden bridges adds cultural depth. The overall image exudes a peaceful and harmonious feeling, invoking a sense of calmness and natural beauty.
validityText:
The input is structured as a list of labeled attributes rather than a cohesive natural language description. It uses semi-colons to separate different sections, which deviates from a single-paragraph narrative intended for AI-generated photo prompts.
